attributes.action: Introduce and enforce existing laws regarding unsafe and illegal riding of bicycles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Laws should make it a traffic offence for a a cyclist to: 

jump traffic lights, 
have no lights attached to the bike and used at lighting up time, 
ride two on a bike,
ride listening to music through ear phones, 
cross between the front of one car and the back of another,
not use hand signals,
not use hands,
not use cycle paths when they are available

All cyclists should have a license that can be endorsed or taken away if laws are broken. On the spot fines should also be imposed.

rejection.details:
